item.title: Home1 Molly Newsletter
item.content:
NEWSLETTER

Sign up to receive the coupon 15% off for your first purchase via email and get informations about bicycle.

*Discount applies only to orders over $100

item.title: Home4 Molly Service
item.content:
MONEY GUARANTEE

30 days money guarantee!

 
ONLINE SUPPORT

We support online 24/7

 
PAYMENT SECURE

Secure all your payment

 
UK FREE DELIVERY

Free on all orders over £99.99

cms_page.title: Home page 4
cms_page.content:
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\Slider"}}
 
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="home1_molly_service"}}
 
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="molly_shop_cate_promobanner"}}
 
{{widget type="MGS\Promobanners\Block\Widget\Banner" banner_id="home4_molly_promo_deal" template="banner.phtml"}}
{{block class="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Products\Deals" title="Hot Deal Everyday" products_count="1" per_row="1" custom_class="" note_text="Get Free Shipping on all orders over $75 and free returns to our UK returns centre! " template="products/deals/special.phtml"}}
 
 
{{block class="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Products\Grid\NewProducts" title="NEW PRODUCTS" products_count="8" custom_class="tabs-colon" note_text="Trending Fashion In This Season" template="products/grid/new.phtml}}
 
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="home1_molly_newsletter"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Promobanners\Block\Widget\Banner" banner_id="home4_molly_promo_newsletter" template="banner.phtml"}}
 
 
{{widget type="MGS\Blog\Block\Widget\Lastest" title="FROM OUR BLOG" number_of_posts="3" show_thumbnail="1" thumbnail_width="240" thumbnail_height="180" show_short_content="1" limit_characters_short_content="150" view_as="owl_carousel" items="3" autoplay="1" template="widget/default.phtml"}}
 
{{widget type="MGS\Brand\Block\Widget\Brand" title="OUR CLIENTS" brand_ids="1,2,3,4,5,6" show_brand_name="0" view_as="owl_carousel" items="5" image_width="216" image_height="164" autoplay="1" stop_on_hover="1" navigation="1" template="widget/default.phtml"}}
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="home4_molly_service"}}
